summary: Car price prediction system; user is creating cartoon-style ads and wants to publish it so it can be searchable on Google.
architectural_notes: Plan for public deployment with a stable URL/domain so the app can be indexed by search engines.
Add SEO/indexing basics (robots.txt, sitemap.xml, indexable pages/meta) to support Google discoverability.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Wide hero banner illustration of a modern car showroom with subtle ML/data overlay (car-showroom-hero.dim_1200x600.jpg)
- Social share preview image with a car silhouette and abstract chart/ML motifs (ml-car-prediction.dim_800x400.jpg)

existing_features.title: Populate frontend/public/robots.txt with crawler rules that allow indexing and include a Sitemap directive pointing to /sitemap.xml.
Populate frontend/public/sitemap.xml with a valid XML sitemap that lists the public URLs that should be indexed (at minimum the site root).
Ensure the SEO images referenced by the app exist as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated using the exact filenames already referenced in the codebase.

new_feature_requests.summary: Publish/deploy the car price prediction system publicly (production release)
Enable Google search visibility (SEO + indexing via domain/public URL, sitemap/robots)

projectName: Enable Google indexing (robots.txt + sitemap.xml) and ensure SEO assets exist
